cards.markdown:
[![](https://i2.wp.com/static.flickr.com/33/97095075_e01faace9c.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/97095075/ "photo sharing") [The road home](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/97095075/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
Bit of a naughty photo this one, grabbed through the windshield of my car as I drove home from Suffolk this morning. Why? Well, I was just enjoying not commuting the normal London route for once, and enjoying seeing the view from the A12 in daylight. I seem to see it at night most of the time, and it really does pass through an attractive part of the world, despite its flatness. (I’m a hills-and-trees guy at heart) Anyway, there you have it: today’s one-off alternative commute.
